objectsFlagDescription: a list of sObject API names
outputdirFlagDescription: a directory to output the .xlsx files
labelFlagDescription: require .xlsx file to include field labels
descriptionFlagDescription: require .xlsx file to include field descriptions
helptextFlagDescription: require .xlsx file to include field help texts
picklistFlagDescription: require .xlsx file to include picklist values
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
